pages.text: This material is the foundation of Create, make a lot of it. $(br2)I recommend using the version of the recipe that only needs 2 Iron Ingots and 2 Andesite Alloy blocks. $(br2)Turn to the next page to see the recipe.
This recipe can't be mirrored.$(br2)In base Create, Zinc Ore is a non-renewable resource. Consequently, this makes Brass non-renewable.

Knowing this, it is only logical to use Iron Nuggets instead of Zinc Nuggets when making Andesite Alloy.$(br2)Iron is renewable while Zinc is not.$(br2)Also, a fun fact: Copper is actually renewable from Drowned in vanilla Minecraft.
